job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Proven track record working with higher tier customer issues (system, back-end issues)
2+ years software development experience
Experience with common software development methodologies and practices
Basic familiarity with cloud infrastructures such as
AWS
Azure
GCP
Other general technical skills
Basic Linux / Unix experience
Docker
Kafka
Heroku
. Minimum work experience: 5 - 8 YEARS
